option.advancedautopilot.debug: Show debug information in the HUD
option.advancedautopilot.emergencyLandin: Perform emergency landing when elytra durability is low
option.advancedautopilot.maxElytraSwapDu: Maximum durability to swap elytra at
option.advancedautopilot.maxEmergencyLan: Maximum elytra durability to perform emergency landing at
option.advancedautopilot.minElytraSwapRe: Minimum durability for replacement elytra during swap
option.advancedautopilot.swapElytra: Automatically swap out elytra when durability is low
text.advancedautopilot.notFlying: Start flying before engaging the autopilot
text.advancedautopilot.swappedElytra: Swapped out elytra with low durability
tooltip.advancedautopilot.emergencyLandi: If elytra swap is enabled, this only activates when all elytra have low durability
tooltip.advancedautopilot.maxElytraSwapD: Must be less than max emergency landing durability
tooltip.advancedautopilot.maxEmergencyLa: Must be greater than max elytra swap durability
tooltip.advancedautopilot.minElytraSwapR: Must be greater than max elytra swap durability
